LanguageData.VG_IronWoodLog.label: Ironwood
LanguageData.VG_IronWoodLog.description: Wood from ironwood trees. Useful for building structures, weapons, and even simple prosthetics. A raw stick of wood can be used as a weapon in a pinch. Very beautiful decorative material.
